DLQ_ADD_AMT , 0 AS DLQ_ADD_DP , 0 AS DLQ_ADD_BLAM , 0 AS UC_AMT , 0 AS UC_DP , 638330 AS UC_BLAM , 0 AS TOT_DP_AMT , 0 AS SPMT_SL , 0 AS CCAM , 0 AS LSFE , 9383380 AS RTLFE1 , 0 AS RTLFE_ISTM1 , AS IST_MPNO , '02-1234-5678' AS IST_TNO , '111111111' AS CST_NO , '2022-03-03' AS TF_DT , '2022-03-03' AS BU_NOTI_DT , '05 선생님 본인구입' AS BU_NOTI_TP , '12345' AS CNTR_ZIP , '서울특별시 중구 을지로 52' AS CNTR_ADR , '12345' AS IST_ZIP , '서울특별시 중구 을지로 52' AS IST_ADR , '농협은행' AS VT_AC_BNK , '11111111111111' AS VT_ACNO , '2022-10-11' AS PESU_DT , '2022-10-11' AS HI_DT , '2022-10-11' AS OVRD_DT , '2022-10-11' AS '11111' AS SFK , '입력' AS UNUITM FROM DUAL WHERE 1=1 ) A WHERE 1=1 AND A.DV = #{schDv}
